name: px2any
description: Px2Any is a Visual Studio Code extension that automatically converts pixel (px) values into other units such as rem, em, vw, and displays the conversions via hover tooltips. When you write a size in pixels, simply hover over the value, and the extension will show the converted equivalents. This makes responsive design easier and helps you quickly choose the right units.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
